data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Juncos to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Juncos, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Juncos, Puerto Rico to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 25,780 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Juncos, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Juncos. Through your servants plant 7 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Juncos.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Juncos to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Juncos, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Juncos, Puerto Rico has a population of 38,200.

We estimate Juncos has 12,420 people who might know Jesus, 23,697 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,083 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
